description: 14 sessions (2/day x 7 days) for Jamie Rivera test profile. Session IDs are deterministic via uuid5(P8_NAMESPACE, 'seed-session:{name}').

sessions.name: jamie-standup-day1
sessions.description: Morning standup — reviewed priorities, blockers, and sprint goals

sessions.name: jamie-voice-pdf-day1
sessions.description: Voice note about onboarding ideas + uploaded quarterly report PDF

sessions.name: jamie-architecture-day2
sessions.description: Architecture discussion on caching layer and Redis benchmarks

sessions.name: jamie-image-reminder-day2
sessions.description: Captured whiteboard photo and set a follow-up reminder

sessions.name: jamie-sprint-retro-day3
sessions.description: Sprint retrospective with full team — deployment frequency and test flakiness

sessions.name: jamie-api-note-day3
sessions.description: Notes on API v2 migration plan and breaking changes

sessions.name: jamie-competitive-docx-day4
sessions.description: Uploaded competitive analysis DOCX on Notion AI features

sessions.name: jamie-observation-day4
sessions.description: Observed user onboarding drop-off patterns with Jordan

sessions.name: jamie-voice-mobile-day5
sessions.description: Voice memo on mobile push notification strategy

sessions.name: jamie-investor-meeting-day5
sessions.description: Investor meeting prep and Q&A practice session

sessions.name: jamie-code-review-day6
sessions.description: Code review session — auth module refactor and test coverage

sessions.name: jamie-xlsx-metrics-day6
sessions.description: Uploaded Q2 metrics spreadsheet with growth projections

sessions.name: jamie-team-planning-day7
sessions.description: Team planning meeting — sprint goals, capacity, and OKR check-in

sessions.name: jamie-event-sourcing-day7
sessions.description: Notes on event sourcing architecture for payments domain
